name: Unblock - block puzzle
description:
So you think you can just move around a couple blocks and match 3 in a row without a problem? It's not that easy in Unblock! Solve match 3 puzzles like never before! Tease your brain and try and figure out how to unlock all the locked blocks. You can only move blocks on the periphery. Good thing at the top you can see the color of your next block so you can plan ahead! The game only gets more fun with rainbow blocks, bombs and other boosters! Use them wisely to help you keep moving on to new levels.

Gameplay:
- Fun puzzles
- Unique problem-solving
- Compare your achievements with other players
- Booster blocks
- Tons of levels
